Restless Limb SyndromeDiabetesAcid RfluxHigh Blood PressureOsteoarthritisProbable Fibromyalgia

Hi, did we ever do this poll?  If not, I'll try to revive it.Here are a few more conditions that are mimics of or may be otherwise related (ie: some are also autoimmune diseases) to MS:SarcoidosisRheumatoid arthritisLupusMyasthenia gravisIdiopathic thrombocytopenic purpuraInfectious mononucleosisLyme
More mimics:Sjogren's syndrome -some literature suggests it may actually be connected to MS (not sure I believe it or not)CDIP (chronic demylinating inflammatory polyneuropathy)migraines

Of the things listed so far, I'd have to say I've had a half dozen or so.  Arrhythmia, gall bladder, sleep apnea, depression, itching, some bowel and bladder issues now and then, an outbreak of migraine one summer 12 years ago and another instance this month, and since late last month my blood pressure's been too high.  I've also had some joint pain and swelling issues that I have always assumed is osteoarthritis.  I didn't see anyone mention tremor.  I guess that's more than half a dozen.  I'll have to quit reading stuff like this; I'll start to feel like there's something wrong with me! ;P
epileptic seizures - they heralded a relapse for me

Grand Mal Seizures - this is how I presented prior to MS diagnosisAsthmaCOPD - as related to smoking (seems to be a lot of smokers with MS vs seems to be a lot of people with MS that smoke?)Paratrigeminal/Trigeminal Neuralgia

question: I love the poll on meds!Many of us have sought connections between MS and other health issues.  Let's develop a list of other health issues and then poll the forum.  What issues should we include?1.  thyroid2.  tachycardia/arrhythmia3.  hypertension4.  diabetes5.  gall bladder6.  arthritis7.  psoriasis8.I'm drawing a blank, but I know there are other issues mentioned frequently on the forum?????
title: Other Health Issues: Let's do a poll!
